0.1.2.name: wordpress/video-game-life-meter
0.1.2.description: The plugin comes with a widget which offers a title, health level (1-100) and caption option. It all so includes a short code so you can include it in your posts or pages. A great plugin for reviewin video games, comics, movies or anything really. Use the shortcode in a review post to give the subject a rating out of 5stars.
